rules_text:
Machinate {2}{W}{B} [i](You may cast this spell with no targets for its machinate cost. If you do, create a 1/1 Puppet, then attach this to it.)[/i]
Enchant creature you control
When Weight of Remorse enters, destroy all creatures other than enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature has “You can't win the game and your opponents can't lose the game.”
